channel.title: review on Saskatchewan Open Data
channel.description: Recent content in review on Saskatchewan Open Data

item.title: A Review of Open Data in Saskatachewan 2017
item.description: It was International Open Data Day on March 5, 2017. The day has breezed by me this year, as with many previous years. Let’s review where the province has been on open data over this time and where it might be going. Recap of Open Data Saskatchewan This site has now been live for just over 5 years. There hasn’t been much change to the site over this time, but there have been some changes in the province.
